name: Vadi (itch)
description:
Vadi

Made prior to any of the other games released before this one on my profile, this game offers a short glimpse into the vision that I held when creating a top down adventure game.

This project picked up steam when I used it as the head peace for my scholarship application to SAE institute, which would see me being 1 of 2 winners in all of Australia.

This project was originally planed to have been made into a full game, however my skills have grown and I have my eyes on new things.

Made by Caleb Palmer
